game.test_skills: Test your skills against the AI
game.rules_description: Earn points by getting the ball past your opponent's paddle. The first to reach the winning score wins!

controls_info.toggle_ai_debug: Press Alt+Q to toggle AI prediction visualization

ai_mode.title: AI PONG
ai_mode.subtitle: Challenge the computer
ai_mode.description: Play against an AI opponent with multiple difficulty levels. Use precise timing and anticipate the AI's moves to win.

brick_breaker.title: BRICK BREAKER
brick_breaker.subtitle: Square Arena Multiplayer Mode
brick_breaker.rules: Break your opponents' bricks to earn points. The first to reach the winning score wins!

about.title: About

project_description.part1: ft_transcendence is a real-time online Pong platform developed as part of the 42 school program. This project challenges us to create a full web application with user authentication, real-time gameplay, tournament systems, and social features.
project_description.part2: Our implementation includes local and AI-based gameplay, customizable settings, user profiles, and a modern interface designed for an exceptional gaming experience.

feature_descriptions.realtime: Play the classic Pong with modern graphics and smooth gameplay
feature_descriptions.ai: Challenge our AI with adjustable difficulty levels
feature_descriptions.profiles: Create your profile, track your stats, and review your match history
feature_descriptions.customization: Customize your gaming experience with various visual options
feature_descriptions.authentication: Robust authentication system with 42 OAuth integration
feature_descriptions.responsive: Enjoy the game on different devices and screen sizes

about.team_description: ft_transcendence was developed by a dedicated team of 42 school students, combining expertise in web development, game design, and user experience to create this immersive online Pong platform.

contact.title: Meet
contact.subtitle: The minds behind ft_transcendence
contact.intro: Our team of five developers worked together to create this immersive Pong experience. Each member contributed unique skills and perspectives to bring ft_transcendence to life.

descriptions.frontend: Containerization of various services and implementation of a global server to optimize site management, security, and performance.
descriptions.backend: Development of the registration feature, as well as tools for storing and managing user data, ensuring maximum security and a smooth user experience.
descriptions.game: Creation and integration of multiple versions of the Pong game, alongside platforms and visual interfaces to provide an immersive experience.
descriptions.devops: Implementation of dynamic site translation into multiple languages to ensure optimal accessibility.
descriptions.fullstack: Support for the development of game modes and their interfaces, aiming to enhance user interaction.

descriptions.planning: We began by breaking down requirements and planning our architecture. This included choosing technologies, designing database schemas, and creating wireframes.
descriptions.development: With a clear plan, we iteratively built the core features. Starting with the basic Pong game, we added authentication, user profiles, and multiplayer capabilities.
descriptions.polishing: After implementing the main functionality, we refined the UI/UX, optimized performance, and introduced extra features like AI opponents and customization options.
descriptions.deployment: Finally, we containerized the application with Docker, set up Nginx for routing, and implemented security measures for a production-ready deployment.
